PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2015-06952015-05-28,  ,  CH,  , 
ActPublic Servants Disclosure Protection Act
PrecisReappointment of the HONOURABLE MARIE-JOSÉE BÉDARD of Gatineau, Quebec, a Judge of the Federal Court, to act as Chairperson of the Public Servants Disclosure Protection Tribunal for a period of one year or until such time as a new Chairperson is appointed, whichever comes first, effective June 11, 2015.
